standard.description: Best practices to keep things tidy

test.query_clob:
with std as (
    select case when months_between (sysdate, api.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                then case when api.condition_type = 'Never'
                          then 'NEVERCONPAGEITEM'
                          end
                end child_code,
           api.condition_type,
           api.application_id,
           api.page_id,
           api.item_id component_id,
           api.item_name,
           api.last_updated_by,
           api.last_updated_on,
           api.build_option,
	         api.workspace
    from apex_application_page_items api
	  where api.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) should be available or deleted (%3). It has been unavailable since `%4`',
                          p0 => std.item_name,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p3 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERCONPAGEITEM'
                                     then 'Never condition'
                                     end,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) should be available',
                          p0 => std.item_name,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
		 std.component_id,
		 null parent_component_id,
		 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation: Page Items should be made available or deleted : Page regions and items that have had their Server-Side Condition set to "Never" (for whatever reason), should be removed. Including these items/regions just creates unnecessary app bloat.
test.fix: Make item available or delete it
